TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Значение термина `browsable` в описания для этого [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] является аналогом описания, переданные для , но особенно важно, чтобы сведения о свойстве для отображаемоесостояниедляприсоединенногосвойства[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], поскольку присоединенное свойство в основном [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] концепции.The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. Это [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] должно применяться только для метода доступа get присоединенного свойства определений.This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. Не устанавливайте это [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] метода доступа set.Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. Хотя интуитивно операции задания, выполняемого изменения могут просматривать [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] для соответствующих элементов является наличие и характеристики доступа get для свойства, определяющего элемент, который в действительности поведение.Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. Общие сведения об объявлении вложенных свойств см. в разделе [зависимостей](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

param.name: attributeType
param.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

span.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Значение можно задать только с помощью `attributeType` параметр [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] конструктор.The value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Эта реализация поддерживает равенство значений одного возможного настраиваемые значения, предоставляемые этим атрибутом .This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .

summary.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Эта реализация поддерживает несколько возможных хэш-значения, на основе одного возможных настраиваемые значения, предоставляемые этим атрибутом .This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .
